alert.note: Alert for Bates (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 01 at 1:37PM CDT until June 04 at 11:24PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Missouri... Marais Des Cygnes River at La Cygne affecting Linn KS County. Marais Des Cygnes River near Trading Post affecting Bates and Linn KS Counties. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Marais Des Cygnes River near Trading Post. * WHEN...Until late Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, Flooding of low-lying farmland occurs and water begins to approach Stateline Road north of the river gauge. At 29.0 feet, Stateline Road is flooded north of the river gauge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:16 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 25.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 31.7 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Friday evening. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri 7pm 7pm 7pm Marais Des Cygnes River Trading Post 27.0 25.9 Wed 1pm 28.3 31.4 28.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
